::Slaughter::

     Slaughter had his mind connected with Motormaster's.  S=
laughter sent an image of Squawktalk, then a red circle around Squawktalk, =
and a diagonal line going across=3D ( / ).  Then, a voice, not Slaughter's,=
 but Skulletron's old, robotic voice, started speaking in Motormaster's hea=
d.

      "Squawktalk......was.....useless........or shall I say.........a =
deciever..........On his....second....time around.........he planned to com=
e up with something to merge Beastbox with him permanently, and take....ful=
l.....control over Squawkbox.......and, then.....he would......pick off....=
..the Decepticons.....one by one............Slaughter...........killed.....=
..Squawktalk......not only for his own....needs........but knowing that Squ=
awktalk was a traitor........Let....Slaughter.......help you.........KILL T=
HE MAXIMALS!!" Skulletron's old voice said.

       At the end, it showed S=
laughter, with a picture of the Decepticon symbol beside him, and a + sign =
in the middle, then, it showed (Slaughter) + (D.Symbol) =3D (Ally)  and for=
 ally, it showed a picture of two hands shaking in agreement or alliance.  =
